trans-unit.source: Enables you to create, configure, and access the properties of a workflow service.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowService" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow service has buffered receive processing enabled for incoming messages.
<see langword="true" /> if the workflow service has buffered receive processing enabled for incoming messages; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si le service de workflow a mis en mémoire tampon de réception le traitement est activé pour les messages entrants. dans le cas contraire, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The buffered receive feature enables a workflow service to process out-of-order messages without relying on complicated poison message handling.
trans-unit.target: La fonctionnalité de réception mise en mémoire tampon permet à un service de flux de travail de traiter les messages non ordonnés sans utiliser la gestion compliquée des messages incohérents.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity tree for this workflow service.
The activity tree for this workflow service.
trans-unit.target: arborescence d'activité pour ce service de flux de travail.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow service configuration name.
The workflow service configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Nom de configuration du service de flux de travail.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the definition identity of the workflow service.
The definition identity of the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: L’identité de la définition du service de workflow.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of endpoints of this workflow service.
The collection of endpoints of this workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Collection de points de terminaison de ce service de flux de travail.

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary of contract descriptions keyed by the contract name.
A dictionary of contract descriptions keyed by the contract name.
Returns the root of the activity tree.
The root of the activity tree.
Gets the contracts implemented by the workflow service.
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> object that contains the contracts implemented by the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Le <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> objet qui contient les contrats implémentés par le service de workflow.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the workflow service as an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> object.
The name of the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Nom du service de flux de travail.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dynamic update maps.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that represents the dynamic update maps.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> mappe de l’objet qui représente la mise à jour dynamique.

trans-unit.source: The custom settings that customize the behavior of the validation process.
Verifies that a workflow service is correctly configured according to the validation logic.
A collection of validation errors and validation warnings as a result of the validation process.
